events.message: The customer submitted a claim regarding a recent car accident involving their sedan and another vehicle at a traffic light.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident as the incident involved a car collision in an urban area.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case promptly to ensure smooth processing for the customer.
The customer received acknowledgment of the claim and was informed about the next steps and required documentation.
Requested police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of the driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including detailed pictures of the damaged car and the official police accident report.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence to assess the extent of damages and liability.
The investigation concluded confirming that the accidental collision was not the customer’s fault and damages were verified.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and a rental vehicle reimbursement was proposed to the policyholder.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the promptness of service and clarity of the settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved by the internal review board after confirmation of all necessary procedures.
Payment was issued to the customer’s bank account covering all approved repair and rental costs.
The claim case was officially closed after confirmation that the customer was satisfied with the resolution.
The claim file was archived for record keeping and future reference in compliance with company policies.
